text:
Hi Community,

Any idea how I can edit this page to have the form be bigger and more centered on the page?
<http://2482846.hs-sites.com/testtesttestit?hs_preview=uISvSSNc-7084954422>

I just added the script to the footer section: This is the only thing I need on the page

"<script>(function(t,e,s,n){var o,a,c;t.SMCX=t.SMCX||[],e.getElementById(n)||(o=e.getElementsByTagName(s),a=o[o.length-1],c=e.createElement(s),c.type="text/javascript",c.async=!0,c.id=n,c.src=["https:"===location.protocol?"https://":"http://","<http://widget.surveymonkey.com/collect/website/js/tRaiETqnLgj758hTBazgd_2BwXQLRKfpkNUYvjv8rvHPCQVfj6DPlSjpCen2Lz5PAU.js|widget.surveymonkey.com/collect/website/js/tRaiETqnLgj758hTBazgd_2BwXQLRKfpkNUYvjv8rvHPCQVfj6DPlSjpCen2Lz5PAU.js>"].join(""),a.parentNode.insertBefore(c,a))})(window,document,"script","smcx-sdk");</script><a style="font: 12px Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #999; text-decoration: none;" href=<https://www.surveymonkey.com>> Create your own user feedback survey </a>
"
You can try implementing this script with it: <https://github.com/davidjbradshaw/iframe-resizer>
that will help with height, then just add a `margin: 0 auto` to `.smcx-embed` class
iframe resizer is an integral part of my life :slightly_smiling_face:  cant recommend it enough.  Just note that you will need to different scripts, one in the iframe source and one on the site

Heyo! I'm having a quite big issue with a client's blog right now. Any and all ideas are welcome, so if you have some time over, please have a look :slightly_smiling_face:

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Custom-monthly-archive-for-blog-posts/td-p/265903>

I'm not sure if this is a dev issue or a HubSpot issue. All of our clients' posts were imported from Wordpress, and while they all have their correct publishing dates, some archive pages just aren't showing all the posts. It's super strange.
